select r.id as id, is_payed, user_id, r.created_at as created_at, payment_deadline , reservation_num, status_enum, airline, arrival_city, departure_airport, departure_city , flight_name, departure_time, arrival_time from reservation_tb as r join ticket_tb as t on r.id = t.reservation_id where user_id = #{userId} and status_enum = #{statusEnum}
and is_payed = true
and is_payed = false
order by departure_time desc

select reservation_num, is_payed, status_enum ,payment_deadline ,first_name, last_name, u.phone_number , airline, departure_city, arrival_city ,departure_time, arrival_time, seat_type, is_one_way from reservation_tb as r join ticket_tb as t on r.id = t.reservation_id join passenger_tb p on t.id = p.id join user_tb u on u.id = r.user_id where reservation_num = #{reservationNum} and r.user_id = #{userId}
